entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:31 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 8:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Fog patches. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 8:49 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 8:49 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 8:49 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
